description: Take command of the agile and classic S2-Carrier aircraft in this DLC expansion for Airplane Flight Simulator. With its compact design offering exceptional agility, you'll find navigating through your ongoing challenges smoother than ever before. Difficulties that once posed greater obstacles may now be overcome with greater ease. Immerse yourself in the captivating environments and realistic flight mechanics of Airplane Flight Simulator with this new addition.
name: Airplane Flight Simulator DLC - Farming Agricultural Plane S2-Carrier
